titles.title: GREEN Ferries Act
To amend title 49, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to make zero-emission or reduced-emission passenger ferry grants, and for other purposes.
GREEN Ferries Act
Greenhouse gas Reduction and Environmental Enhancement through New Ferries Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

term.name: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

bill.summary:
Greenhouse gas Reduction and Environmental Enhancement through New Ferries Act or the GREEN Ferries Act
This bill makes projects to construct or otherwise acquire zero- or reduced-emissions passenger ferries (and related facilities and equipment) eligible for grants that support transit capital, operating assistance, and transportation planning in urbanized areas.
